workshoptitle: Build a Self-Service Infrastructure-as-Code Platform for OCI Using Pulumi

tutorials.title: Get Started
tutorials.description: This is the prerequisites for customers using Free Trial and Paid tenancies, and Always Free accounts (if applicable). The title of the lab and the Contents Menu title (the title above) match for Prerequisite lab. This lab is always first.

tutorials.title: Lab 1: Prepare your workshop
tutorials.description: Log into your tenancy, access Cloud Shell, retrieve lab contents, and sign up for a free Pulumi account

tutorials.title: Lab 2: Deploying Infrastructure with Pulumi
tutorials.description: Use Pulumi to create the Backstage working environment

tutorials.title: Lab 3: Create your first Backstage template
tutorials.description: Create a template for provisioning an OCI Object Storage bucket

tutorials.title: Lab 4: Experiment with additional, more complex templates
tutorials.description: Create another Backstage template for provisioning an Oracle Container Engine for Kubernetes (OKE) cluster

tutorials.title: Lab 5: Cleaning up your tenancy
tutorials.description: Clean-up and remove all deployed resources

tutorials.title: Need Help?
tutorials.description: Solutions to Common Problems and Directions for Receiving Live Help
